name: Zeus
passive_ability_desc: All Greco-Roman allies gain +5% to all stats.
lore: The supreme god of the Olympians, wielder of the thunderbolt and ruler of the skies.

name: Hera
passive_ability_desc: Enemy debuffs have a 10% chance to fail against your team.
lore: Queen of the Gods and goddess of marriage, women, and family.

name: Gaea
passive_ability_desc: The entire team receives a massive defensive boost for the first turn of battle.
lore: The personification of the Earth, one of the Greek primordial deities.

name: Ouranos
passive_ability_desc: The entire team has an increased chance to dodge attacks for the first turn.
lore: The personification of the Sky, the primordial Greek god of the heavens.

name: Typhon
passive_ability_desc: All 'C' tier allies on the team gain a significant boost to their Attack.
lore: The deadliest monster of Greek mythology, a monstrous serpentine giant.

name: Nyx
passive_ability_desc: At the start of battle, envelops the field in darkness, slightly reducing all enemies' accuracy.
lore: The Greek primordial goddess of the night, a shadowy figure of exceptional power and beauty.

name: Odin
passive_ability_desc: Grants a 10% chance to identify an enemy's weakness at the start of battle.
lore: The All-Father of the Norse gods, who sacrificed an eye for cosmic knowledge.

name: Fenrir
passive_ability_desc: Attack increases by 5% for every 20% health missing.
lore: A monstrous wolf, son of Loki, destined to slay Odin during Ragnarok.

name: JÃ¶rmungandr
passive_ability_desc: At the start of battle, applies a 'Poison' debuff to all enemies.
lore: The Midgard Serpent, a sea serpent so large it encircles the world.

name: Surtr
passive_ability_desc: Deals 20% increased damage to 'S' tier characters.
lore: A fire giant who wields a flaming sword and is destined to destroy Asgard.

name: Yggdrasil
passive_ability_desc: All allies on the team gain a slow, steady health regeneration.
lore: An immense and central sacred tree, around which all else exists.

name: The Norns
passive_ability_desc: At the start of battle, apply a random powerful buff to an ally and a random debuff to an enemy.
lore: Three female beings who rule the destiny of gods and men.

name: Hades
passive_ability_desc: Has a 15% chance to dodge an incoming physical attack.
lore: Ruler of the Underworld and lord of the dead, wielding power over wealth and souls.

name: Poseidon
passive_ability_desc: Basic attacks have a 10% chance to briefly lower enemy defense.
lore: God of the sea, earthquakes, and storms, wielding the mighty trident.

name: Ares
passive_ability_desc: The entire team gains +5% Attack for the first 3 turns of combat.
lore: The fearsome and often brutal Greek god of war and courage.

name: Apollo
passive_ability_desc: Critical hit chance is increased by 5%.
lore: God of music, arts, knowledge, and light. Known for his skill with the bow.

name: Artemis
passive_ability_desc: Deals 15% more damage to enemies with less than 50% HP.
lore: Goddess of the hunt, the wilderness, and wild animals. A master archer.

name: Hephaestus
passive_ability_desc: All equipped Heirlooms on the team have 5% increased effectiveness.
lore: God of blacksmiths, metalworking, and fire. The divine craftsman of Olympus.

name: Prometheus
passive_ability_desc: Increases the damage of all 'Fire' element allies by 5%.
lore: A Titan who stole fire from the gods and gave it to humanity.

name: Atlas
passive_ability_desc: Cannot be moved or displaced by enemy abilities. High resistance to stuns.
lore: The Titan condemned to hold up the celestial heavens for eternity.

name: Cronus
passive_ability_desc: Deals bonus damage to 'S' tier Greco-Roman gods.
lore: The leader of the first generation of Titans, who overthrew his father Ouranos.

name: Rhea
passive_ability_desc: When an ally's HP drops below 25%, they receive a significant one-time heal.
lore: The Titaness mother of the gods, and goddess of female fertility and motherhood.

name: Scylla
passive_ability_desc: Attacks have a chance to strike a secondary, random target for minor damage.
lore: A legendary sea monster who haunted the rocks of a narrow strait.

name: Charybdis
passive_ability_desc: At the start of its turn, has a chance to pull the fastest enemy to the front and slow them.
lore: A sea monster, later rationalized as a whirlpool, who swallows and spews water.

name: Eris
passive_ability_desc: When attacking, has a chance to cause enemies to attack their own allies.
lore: The Greek goddess of strife and discord, known for starting the Trojan War.

name: Thor
passive_ability_desc: Deals 10% additional damage to characters of the 'Giant' class.
lore: The mighty God of Thunder, defender of Asgard and wielder of Mjolnir.

name: Loki
passive_ability_desc: When attacked, has a 5% chance to create a duplicate, causing the attack to miss.
lore: The cunning trickster god, a shapeshifter who walks a fine line between ally and enemy.

name: Freya
passive_ability_desc: Grants a small amount of healing to the most injured ally at the end of her turn.
lore: Goddess of love, beauty, fertility, and war, who rides a chariot pulled by cats.

name: Frigg
passive_ability_desc: Reduces the duration of negative status effects on all allies by 1 turn.
lore: Odin's wife, the goddess of wisdom and foresight.

name: Hel
passive_ability_desc: Enemies defeated by this character cannot be revived.
lore: The goddess who presides over the underworld realm of the dead, Helheim.

name: Ymir
passive_ability_desc: At the start of battle, slightly lowers the Speed of all enemies.
lore: The ancestor of all jÃ¶tnar (giants), from whose body the world was created.

name: Jord
passive_ability_desc: Allies on the team take reduced damage from 'Earth' and 'Physical' attacks.
lore: The personification of the Earth in Norse mythology, and the mother of Thor.

name: Athena
passive_ability_desc: Increases the effectiveness of defensive abilities for all allies by 5%.
lore: Goddess of wisdom, handicraft, and strategic warfare, born from the head of Zeus.

name: Hermes
passive_ability_desc: Expeditions featuring this character are completed 5% faster.
lore: The swift-footed messenger of the gods, a patron of travelers and thieves.

name: Dionysus
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to apply a random buff or debuff with each attack.
lore: God of wine, festivity, and madness. His presence inspires ecstasy.

name: Achilles
passive_ability_desc: Takes 50% less damage from the first hit received in battle.
lore: The greatest Greek warrior of the Trojan War, nearly invincible save for his heel.

name: Odysseus
passive_ability_desc: Increases the chance of finding rare loot during Expeditions by 2%.
lore: The clever king of Ithaca, famed for his ten-year journey home after the Trojan War.

name: Medusa
passive_ability_desc: Basic attacks have a small chance to stun the target for 1 turn.
lore: A Gorgon with a gaze that could turn onlookers to stone.

name: Icarus
passive_ability_desc: Has very high Speed, but takes increased damage from 'Fire' element attacks.
lore: The son of the master craftsman Daedalus, known for flying too close to the sun.

name: Theseus
passive_ability_desc: Deals bonus damage to 'Minotaur' and other beast-type enemies.
lore: A mythical king and founder-hero of Athens, famed for slaying the Minotaur.

name: Orpheus
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to prevent an enemy from using their abilities for 1 turn.
lore: A legendary musician and poet whose music could charm all living things.

name: Jason
passive_ability_desc: Increases the Speed of all allies on Expeditions.
lore: The leader of the Argonauts in their quest for the Golden Fleece.

name: Pan
passive_ability_desc: Increases the chance of encountering rare 'Opportunities' during Expeditions.
lore: The god of the wild, shepherds and flocks, and rustic music.

name: Charon
passive_ability_desc: Allies who are revived return with slightly more HP.
lore: The ferryman of Hades who carries souls of the newly deceased across the river Styx.

name: Chiron
passive_ability_desc: All 'B' and 'C' tier allies on the team gain a small boost to all stats.
lore: A wise and just Centaur, known for his knowledge and skill in medicine.

name: Nemesis
passive_ability_desc: Reflects a percentage of damage taken back at attackers who land a critical hit.
lore: The goddess who enacts retribution against those who succumb to hubris.

name: Nike
passive_ability_desc: The entire team gains a small boost to all stats for 1 turn after defeating an enemy.
lore: The goddess who personified victory, also known as the Winged Goddess.

name: Hecate
passive_ability_desc: Increases the duration of negative status effects on enemies by 1 turn.
lore: A goddess associated with magic, witchcraft, the night, and ghosts.

name: Asclepius
passive_ability_desc: Greatly increases the effectiveness of all healing abilities.
lore: The Greek god of medicine, son of Apollo.

name: Morpheus
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to put an enemy to sleep for 1 turn with each ability used.
lore: The god of dreams, who can shape and appear in the dreams of mortals.

name: Hypnos
passive_ability_desc: Attacks against sleeping enemies are guaranteed critical hits.
lore: The personification of sleep, the twin brother of Thanatos.

name: Thanatos
passive_ability_desc: Instantly defeats non-boss enemies below 10% HP.
lore: The personification of peaceful death.

name: Heimdall
passive_ability_desc: Grants the team a high chance to avoid being ambushed during Expeditions.
lore: The ever-vigilant guardian of the BifrÃ¶st bridge, who can see for a hundred leagues.

name: Tyr
passive_ability_desc: Has an increased chance to land critical hits against 'Chaotic' element enemies.
lore: The one-handed god of law, justice, and heroic glory in Norse mythology.

name: Valkyrie
passive_ability_desc: If an ally is defeated, this character gains a temporary Speed boost.
lore: A host of female figures who guide the souls of chosen warriors to Valhalla.

name: Skadi
passive_ability_desc: Deals increased damage to enemies that are slowed or stunned.
lore: Norse goddess associated with bowhunting, skiing, winter, and mountains.

name: Baldur
passive_ability_desc: Immune to all status effects for the first 2 turns of battle.
lore: The beloved son of Odin and Frigg, known for his beauty and invulnerability.

name: Ullr
passive_ability_desc: Increases the chance of finding rare crafting materials during Expeditions.
lore: A god associated with skiing, archery, and hunting.

name: Bragi
passive_ability_desc: Increases the duration of positive status effects on all allies by 1 turn.
lore: The skaldic god of poetry in Norse mythology.

name: Vidar
passive_ability_desc: Gains a massive Attack boost for one turn after an ally is defeated.
lore: A son of Odin, destined to avenge his father's death by killing Fenrir.

name: Sif
passive_ability_desc: Increases the amount of Gold found on Expeditions by 5%.
lore: A goddess associated with earth and the wife of Thor, known for her golden hair.

name: Mimir
passive_ability_desc: Provides a chance to start the battle with extra energy for abilities.
lore: A figure known for his knowledge and wisdom, beheaded and carried by Odin.

name: Forseti
passive_ability_desc: When this character is attacked, the attacker has a chance to be disarmed for 1 turn.
lore: The god of justice and reconciliation in Norse mythology.

name: Idunn
passive_ability_desc: Provides a powerful one-time heal to the entire team when their average HP drops below 30%.
lore: The goddess who possesses the apples of youth that grant the gods their immortality.

name: Centaur
passive_ability_desc: Has slightly increased Attack on the first turn of combat.
lore: A creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse.

name: Satyr
passive_ability_desc: Has a small chance to slightly lower the speed of a random enemy.
lore: A troop of male companions of Dionysus with goat-like features.

name: Cyclops
passive_ability_desc: High resistance to being stunned or paralyzed.
lore: A member of a primordial race of giants, each with a single eye in the center of its forehead.

name: Minotaur
passive_ability_desc: Deals more damage in enclosed 'cave' or 'dungeon' type expeditions.
lore: A monstrous creature with the head of a bull and the body of a man.

name: Harpy
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to attack twice with basic attacks.
lore: A winged spirit known for stealing food and carrying evildoers to their punishment.

name: Siren
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to cause enemies to attack each other with basic attacks.
lore: Dangerous creatures who lured nearby sailors with their enchanting music.

name: Gorgon
passive_ability_desc: Reflects a small amount of damage taken back at the attacker.
lore: A monstrous female figure, Medusa was the most famous among them.

name: Nymph
passive_ability_desc: Slightly increases the amount of Gold found on Expeditions.
lore: A minor female nature deity typically associated with a particular location or landform.

name: Dryad
passive_ability_desc: Slightly increases the amount of crafting materials found on Expeditions.
lore: A tree nymph or tree spirit in Greek mythology.

name: Chimera
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to attack with Fire, Physical, or Dark damage.
lore: A monstrous fire-breathing hybrid creature, composed of the parts of more than one animal.

name: Hydra
passive_ability_desc: Recovers a small amount of HP at the start of each turn.
lore: A serpentine water monster with many heads that would regrow if severed.

name: Cerberus
passive_ability_desc: Prevents enemies from fleeing from combat.
lore: The multi-headed dog that guards the gates of the Underworld.

name: Griffin
passive_ability_desc: Increases the chance of finding rare items during Expeditions by 1%.
lore: A legendary creature with the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

name: Pegasus
passive_ability_desc: Greatly reduces the duration of Expeditions this character is on.
lore: A mythical winged divine horse, one of the most recognized creatures in Greek mythology.

name: Talos
passive_ability_desc: Immune to 'Poison' and 'Bleed' status effects.
lore: A giant automaton made of bronze, crafted by Hephaestus to protect Europa.

name: Echidna
passive_ability_desc: Summons a weak 'Monster' ally when her health first drops below 50%.
lore: A monster, half-woman and half-snake, who became the mother of most Greek monsters.

name: Ladon
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to disarm an opponent for 1 turn, preventing ability use.
lore: The serpent-like dragon that guarded the golden apples in the Garden of the Hesperides.

name: Argus
passive_ability_desc: High resistance to being surprised or ambushed. Cannot be blinded.
lore: A hundred-eyed giant, whose eyes were transplanted to the peacock's tail.

name: Sphinx
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to confuse an enemy, causing them to attack a random target.
lore: A mythical creature with the head of a human and the body of a lion.

name: Hecatoncheires
passive_ability_desc: Can attack multiple random enemies with its basic attack.
lore: Giants of incredible strength and ferocity, with one hundred hands and fifty heads.

name: Triton
passive_ability_desc: Deals increased damage in 'Water' or 'Ocean' type expeditions.
lore: A Greek god of the sea, the son of Poseidon and Amphitrite.

name: Hippocampus
passive_ability_desc: Increases the speed of all allies on 'Water' type expeditions.
lore: A mythological creature shared by Phoenician, Greek, and Etruscan mythologies.

name: Empusa
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to drain a small amount of HP from an enemy with each attack.
lore: A demigoddess of Greek mythology, known for seducing men before eating them.

name: Laelaps
passive_ability_desc: Has a very high chance to dodge the first attack directed at it.
lore: A Greek mythological dog that always caught its prey.

name: Draugr
passive_ability_desc: Has a small chance to survive a fatal blow with 1 HP.
lore: An undead creature from Norse mythology that guards its burial mound.

name: Frost Giant
passive_ability_desc: Takes reduced damage from 'Fire' element attacks.

name: Fire Giant
passive_ability_desc: Nearby enemies take a small amount of Fire damage each turn.
lore: A giant from Muspelheim, the realm of fire.

name: Troll
passive_ability_desc: Ignores a small percentage of the enemy's defense.
lore: A class of being in Norse mythology, often depicted as slow and dim-witted.

name: Light Elf
passive_ability_desc: Increases the effectiveness of healing abilities on the team by 5%.
lore: Fair creatures who live in Alfheim, the realm of the elves.

name: Dark Elf

name: Dwarf

name: Einherjar

lore: The spirits of glorious warriors who feast in Valhalla, awaiting Ragnarok.

name: Sleipnir
passive_ability_desc: Dramatically reduces the duration of Expeditions this character is on.
lore: Odin's eight-legged horse, the swiftest of all horses.

name: Huginn
passive_ability_desc: Provides a small chance to reveal one of an enemy's abilities at the start of battle.
lore: One of Odin's two ravens, who flies across the world to bring him information.

name: Muninn
passive_ability_desc: Provides a small chance to reduce the cooldown of an ally's ability.
lore: One of Odin's two ravens, who flies across the world to bring him information.

lore: A dragon who gnaws at a root of the world tree, Yggdrasil.

lore: A member of the race of giants in Norse mythology.

lore: A squirrel who runs up and down the world tree Yggdrasil, carrying messages.

passive_ability_desc: Attack is high, but has a chance to attack a random target, including allies.

passive_ability_desc: Increases the effectiveness of status effects applied by the team.

name: Eurus

lore: The personification of day in Norse mythology.

name: Heracles
passive_ability_desc: Upon defeating an enemy, gains a small, permanent stacking bonus to Attack for the rest of the battle.

name: Persephone
passive_ability_desc: When an ally is defeated, a 'Dread Bloom' appears in their place, dealing damage to enemies that attack it.
lore: Daughter of Zeus and Demeter, she is the Queen of the Underworld and the goddess of spring's bounty.

name: Hestia
passive_ability_desc: Allies are immune to 'Burn' and 'Freeze' status effects. The entire team gains a small defensive boost.
lore: Goddess of the hearth, home, family, and the state. The firstborn of the Titans Cronus and Rhea, she is a gentle and peace-loving deity.

name: Circe
passive_ability_desc: Has a 10% chance to turn an enemy into a non-threatening 'Pig' for 1 turn when using an ability.
lore: A powerful enchantress and minor goddess of magic, renowned for her vast knowledge of potions and herbs and her ability to transform foes into animals.

name: Hippolyta
passive_ability_desc: The first attack against her by a male character has a 50% chance to miss.
lore: A queen of the Amazons, she possessed a magical girdle that was the object of one of Heracles' labors. A fierce and noble warrior.

name: Adonis
passive_ability_desc: At the start of battle, has a chance to apply a 'Charm' debuff to a random enemy for 1 turn.
lore: A mortal youth of such incredible beauty that he was fought over by the goddesses Aphrodite and Persephone.

name: Sigurd
passive_ability_desc: Deals 25% increased damage to 'Dragon' and 'Monster' type enemies.
lore: A legendary hero of Norse mythology who slew the dragon Fafnir with his sword Gram, claiming its cursed treasure.

name: Brynhildr
passive_ability_desc: If 'Sigurd' is on the team, both characters gain a significant critical hit chance bonus.
lore: A powerful shieldmaiden and valkyrie who is a central figure in the saga of Sigurd, awakened by him from a magical sleep.

name: Grendel
passive_ability_desc: Deals bonus damage to enemies that are currently buffed.
lore: A monstrous creature descended from Cain, who terrorized the hall of the Danish king Hrothgar before being slain by Beowulf.

name: Beowulf
passive_ability_desc: Gains a large Attack and Defense boost when fighting 'Monster' or 'Dragon' type enemies.
lore: A heroic warrior of the Geats who came to the aid of the Danish king, defeating the monster Grendel and his mother.

name: Astraeus
passive_ability_desc: Increases the power of 'Wind' element allies on the team by 5%.
lore: Titan god of the stars and planets, and the art of astrology. Father of the four Anemoi (the Winds).

name: Pallas
passive_ability_desc: Increases critical hit chance when fighting alongside another 'Titan' ally.
lore: A Titan god of warcraft, a son of Crius and Eurybia, and a companion of the goddess Athena.

name: Perses
passive_ability_desc: Deals slightly increased damage to structures and fortifications in certain battle modes.
lore: Titan god of destruction. He was the father of Hecate, goddess of magic.

name: MelinoÃ«
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to inflict 'Fear' with each attack, causing enemies to sometimes skip their turn.
lore: A chthonic nymph and goddess, daughter of Persephone, who presided over nightmares and madness.

name: Zagreus
passive_ability_desc: When this character is defeated for the first time, they return with 25% HP and a temporary speed boost.
lore: A god of the Orphic mysteries, often identified with Dionysus, representing the cycle of life, death, and rebirth.

name: Phobos
passive_ability_desc: When an enemy is afflicted with a 'Fear' or 'Stun' debuff, this character's attack is increased.
lore: The personification of fear and panic, a son of Ares and Aphrodite, who accompanied his father into battle.

name: Deimos
passive_ability_desc: Attacks against enemies with low health have a higher chance to be a critical hit.
lore: The personification of terror and dread. He is the twin brother of Phobos and also a son of Ares.

name: Harmonia
passive_ability_desc: Reduces the chance of the 'Berserk' or 'Confuse' status effects on the entire team.
lore: The immortal goddess of harmony and concord. Her necklace brought misfortune to all who possessed it.

name: Ganymede
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to grant a random buff to an ally at the start of his turn.
lore: A divine hero from Troy, who was abducted by Zeus to serve as his cupbearer in Olympus.

name: Cassandra
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to reveal an enemy's next move, but allies may not always be able to act on the information.
lore: A princess of Troy cursed by Apollo to utter true prophecies that were never believed.

name: Penthesilea
passive_ability_desc: Deals increased damage when fighting against 'Hero' class characters like Achilles.
lore: An Amazonian queen who fought in the Trojan War on the side of the Trojans.

name: Diomedes
passive_ability_desc: One of the most respected heroes of the Trojan War, he was even able to wound the gods Ares and Aphrodite.
lore: One of the most respected heroes of the Trojan War, he was even able to wound the gods Ares and Aphrodite.

name: Ajax the Great
passive_ability_desc: Has a high chance to 'Taunt' enemies, drawing single-target attacks to himself.
lore: A Greek hero, son of Telamon, renowned for his immense strength and courage, second only to Achilles.

name: Aeneas
passive_ability_desc: Boosts the stats of all 'Greco-Roman' allies if Heracles is not present on the team.
lore: A Trojan hero who, after the fall of Troy, led his followers to Italy and became the mythical founder of Rome.

name: Camilla
passive_ability_desc: Has an exceptionally high dodge chance but is vulnerable to 'Thrown Weapon' type abilities.
lore: A swift and powerful warrior-maiden from Roman mythology who fought against Aeneas in Italy.

name: Janus
passive_ability_desc: Provides a defensive boost to the team for the first turn, and an offensive boost on the second turn.
lore: Roman god of beginnings, gates, transitions, time, and endings. He is usually depicted with two faces.

name: Vesta
passive_ability_desc: The team is immune to all 'Dark' and 'Shadow' status effects as long as this character is above 50% HP.
lore: Roman goddess of the hearth, home, and family, equivalent to the Greek Hestia. Her sacred fire was kept burning in her temple.

name: Lares
passive_ability_desc: Provides a small, random stat boost to one ally at the start of battle.
lore: Guardian deities in ancient Roman religion. Their function was to protect the household and family.

name: Lemures
passive_ability_desc: Has a small chance to apply a 'Curse' debuff, slightly reducing enemy stats with each attack.
lore: The vengeful and restless dead in Roman mythology, spirits of those who were not given a proper burial.

name: Kratos
passive_ability_desc: Basic attacks cannot be dodged. Deals bonus damage to characters with a 'Divine' or 'God' tag.
lore: The divine personification of strength and power. A son of Pallas and Styx.

name: Bia
passive_ability_desc: Attacks have a higher chance to inflict a 'Stun' against enemies who are already debuffed.
lore: The goddess of force and raw energy, the sister of Kratos.

name: Zelus
passive_ability_desc: Gains a cumulative speed boost for every critical hit landed during battle.
lore: The god of dedication, emulation, eager rivalry, envy, jealousy, and zeal.

name: Elli
passive_ability_desc: Any enemy that attacks this character has their Speed and Attack permanently lowered for the duration of the battle.
lore: The personification of Old Age in Norse mythology, who, in one tale, managed to defeat Thor in a wrestling match.

name: Narfi
passive_ability_desc: If 'Loki' is on the enemy team, this character will focus all attacks on him.
lore: A son of Loki. After his transformation into a wolf, his brother VÃ¡li killed him.

name: Hrungnir
passive_ability_desc: Wields a massive whetstone as a weapon. Attacks have a high chance to ignore enemy defense.
lore: A jÃ¶tunn (giant) from JÃ¶tunheimr, famous for his duel with Thor. He had a head and heart of stone.

name: GrÃ­Ã°r
passive_ability_desc: Provides a random buff to 'Thor' if he is on the same team.
lore: A female jÃ¶tunn who assisted Thor by providing him with magical items to defeat the giant GeirrÃ¶Ã°r.

name: Gefjon
passive_ability_desc: Increases the amount of loot and gold gained from expeditions by 5%.
lore: A goddess associated with ploughing, prosperity, and virginity. Said to have plowed the land that became the Danish island of Zealand.

name: SÃ¡ga
passive_ability_desc: Grants a small chance for an ally to use their ability twice in one turn.
lore: A Norse goddess described as a seeress, possibly another name for Frigg, who dwelt by the stream of time.

name: Eir
passive_ability_desc: All healing abilities used by the team are 20% more effective. Can revive a fallen ally once per battle.
lore: A goddess and valkyrie associated with medical skill and healing. Considered the best of all physicians.

name: Lofn
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to remove 'Taunt' or 'Disarm' debuffs from allies.
lore: A gentle goddess who arranges marriages, even when they have been forbidden.

name: SjÃ¶fn
passive_ability_desc: Has a chance to apply a 'Charm' effect with her basic attacks, lowering enemy attack.
lore: A goddess who directs people's minds to love.

name: Ve
passive_ability_desc: When fighting alongside Odin, both characters gain a boost to all stats.
lore: One of the three brothers, including Odin and Vili, who slew the giant Ymir and created the world.
